job.title: Data Scientist

Typical issues.Debug why scorecards arenât running/ late, build interesting slices etc.How to analyze a scorecard (needs ramp up with DS/Dev)Experimentation healthBuild back P0 (auto shut down) reporting - no reports today to see scorecard delays.Metrics and templates clean up to reduce load on COSMOS where unnecessaryMake sure metrics have updated descriptionsMonitor and remove certain repeat scorecards as needed Triage new metric additions / MG changes to follow best practices (description, use cache) etc. (include DS/Dev)DashboardMonitor platform experimentation healthEnsure updates are done at least weekly for syncsUpdates to dashboard for new dataExperiment programArrange and or share exp brownbags and remind / rally folks experimentsMaintain a FAQs / WikiCommunicationShare monthly updates on health, top changes, top asks, top questions (offline or office hrs)Share live sites via emails / bannersUpdate banners in exp or tools etc.Update or follow up on tooling messages to give self-serve directions -> propose fixes/solutions.Office hours support - Host it, Pull experts, Gather questions and follow ups, answer frequent onesRequired QualificationSQL, Python, basic coding/scripting skillsDashboarding - PowerBI or TableauExcellent communication and partnerships skillsProblem solving skills6mo+ A/B Experimentation & TestingData Science experiencePreferred QualificationOperations or Technical support handling experienceC family language programming experienceMS data stack experience like Cosmos/SCOPE
